objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver with Rose Gold Plating
• Elegant Wreath Design with Pink Drops
• Certificate of Authenticity Included

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a minimal, feminine jewelry ad layout with a balanced left-right composition. The left side features textual elements: the brand name (`tagline`), a bold stacked headline (`heading`), followed by a list of product features (`description`). Below are pricing details prominently displayed (`price`), a review summary (`rating`), and a stylish call-to-action button (`cta_button_background` and `cta`). On the right side, there's a high-quality product image (`product_image`) of rose gold earrings. The background (`background`) uses soft wave patterns, circles, and gradient tones to elevate visual appeal without distraction.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink (#C23B5A)
- Soft Peach (#FFF0F5)
- Light Blush (#FFE4E1)
- Accent Pink (#F8C3CD)
- Deep Pink (#F4A7B9)
- Charcoal Black (#212121)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a delicate pair of earrings predominantly using a soft rose gold (#FADADD) metal base, which provides a luxurious and feminine feel. Accents of blush pink (#F9C6C0) highlight the petal-shaped enamel segments, adding elegance and warmth. The sparkling stones—reminiscent of clear crystal and diamond—use shades of icy white (#FFFFFF) and subtle light grey (#DCE0E3) to enhance brilliance and depth. The colors are skillfully blended with rose gold structures enveloping the stones, creating a cohesive and elegant form. For advertisement design, pair blush pink, rose gold, icy white, and soft grey to maintain luxury and charm.
